note.p: Education: Central Model School in Lahore, then Government College; BSc from University of Punjhab (1911); attended Emmanuel College Cambridge 1911-1919, ScD (Camb); DSc (London)
Career: Professor of Botany at Benares and at University of Punjab (1919); Professor of Botany, Lucknow 91921-1949);
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1950-1951 vol 7 pp 265-277, plate, by H Hamshaw Thomas

References: R Singh and F Riess, 'The nobel laureate Sir Chandrasekhara Venkata Raman FRS and his contacts with the British Scientific community in a social and political context' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 47-64
